SENT.plain: Severe aplastic anemia has been reported in children following Epstein-Barr virus (EBV) infection
The pathophysiology of disease is not known, but an immunologic mechanism is suspected because of the rapid response to steroids
A patient with severe aplastic anemia following EBV infection experienced bone marrow recovery after treatment with high-dose prednisone
After reviewing the literature it is concluded that steroid therapy is indicated in this select group of patients
